Test Name: TERT Promoter Mutation Analysis via Droplet Digital PCR (ddPCR)
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor tissue or fresh frozen tumor tissue (extracted DNA)
Purpose: To detect TERT promoter mutations (C228T and C250T) in tumor DNA for cancer diagnostics and therapeutic decision-making.
Container: FFPE tissue block or cryovial containing fresh frozen tumor tissue
Equipment: Droplet Digital PCR system with automated droplet generator, thermal cycler, droplet reader, fluorescence microplate reader, vortex mixer, and microcentrifuge
